name: Amebot
description: Amebot is a Telegram userbot that running on Python , It help you to manage your telegram easily

TELEGRAM_STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 string_session.py] in Pyrogram or heroku[IMPORTANT]

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: very important for !update command to make Amebot up-to-date , get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: enter app name again here, very important for !update command to make Amebot up-to-date ,
